snippet.title: The Valiant | Showcase Trailer 2022
snippet.description:
Your brother-in-arms abandoned the fight, his men and even his vows after he stumbled upon a fragment of an ancient artefact. Now it is up to you to stop him from collecting the remaining pieces.

Draw your blade for a new generation of RTS combat and team up with comrades in co-op mode in The Valiant – coming soon.

- Links & Info -
Steam: https://thqn.net/val-steam
Epic Games Store: https://thqn.net/val-egs
GOG: https://thqn.net/val-gog
Website: https://thevaliantgame.com
Discord: http://discord.gg/thevaliant
